Text: These zombies are REAL scary, compared to the ridiculous romero types.

Yah, Zombi 2 is not a sequel. The movie called Zombi is actually the one called Dawn of the Dead (Romero) outside of italy. 
I guess nobody trademarked the title, or maybe they can't?
